aeroplane: fuselage (main body) with windows and doors
tail section with a horizontal stabilizer
bird: feathers of varying colors such as brown, grey, blue, green, and yellow
perch or branch it is sitting on
boat: made of metal, wood, or fiberglass
propulsion systems such as motors, sails, or paddles
ropes, anchors, or other nautical equipment
bottle: a narrow neck with a cap or cork
a label or branding on the side
ribs or textures on the surface
bus: a door for entry and exit
possibly a destination sign on the front or side
cat: various colors such as black, white, grey, orange, or tabby.
chair: a piece of furniture for sitting
typically has a backrest and legs
usually has a seat and armrests
can be made of various materials like wood, metal, or plastic
cow: typically black, brown, white, or a mix of these colors
a distinctive body shape, with a large body and relatively small legs
often in a natural or rural setting
diningtable: a piece of furniture with a flat surface
typically rectangular or oval in shape
legs or a base to support the surface
often made of wood, metal, or glass
may have chairs or other seating around it
may have objects such as plates, glasses, or utensils on it
dog: various shapes and sizes of body
different breeds have unique characteristics (e.g. size, coat, color)
horse: brown, black, white, or grey coat
distinctive head shape with a long muzzle and ears
muscular body with a prominent neck and back
motorbike: often reflective surfaces and bright colours
pottedplant: a plant with roots in a container made of materials such as ceramic, plastic, or wood
greenery or flowers visible above the pot
varying shapes and sizes of leaves and flowers
sometimes decorative elements like stones or moss around the base of the plant.
sheep: fluffy or rough texture of the fur
may have a distinctive grazing posture
sofa: legs or a base that supports the sofa
variety of colors, patterns, and fabrics
train: long, connected cars on a rail track
metal body with windows and doors
wheels and a set of rails beneath
a locomotive at the front or rear
a variety of colors and designs depending on the country and type of train
possible presence of cargo or passenger cars
tvmonitor: a thinner frame compared to a television
often lacks a stand or mount
may have a built-in webcam or microphone
input ports for connecting to a computer
may have adjustable height and tilt
